== Nattika (627790) ==

Nattika is a village in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 960 hectares and harbouring 4915 households with total population of 19406 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chavakkad]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 8772 and female population is 10634. Scheduled Caste Population is 1043 and Scheduled Tribes population is 40. Census Location Code of the village is 627790<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
